    Advanced Model Searching Describing a Model with Descriptors Installing a Model Mixed-Effects Models Variable Naming System

    Montero, Ruiz-Peinado, and Munoz (2005)

    montero_2005.Rd

    Allometric models from Montero, Ruiz-Peinado, and Munoz (2005)

    Branch Biomass Models

    bblt2 = cf * exp(a) * dsob^b

    • bblt2 [kg] - branch biomass

    • dsob [cm] - diameter of the stem, outside bark at breast height
